modShortDescription: This mod increases the HP of all default zombies (not animals) depending on their default characteristics.
modDescription:
This mod increases the HP of all default zombies (not animals) depending on their default characteristics.

## Detailed List

_(The Values mean Max HP for Normal/Feral/Radiated [zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/))_

### ZOMBIES: SLIM

* zombieArlene (300/500/700)
* zombieMarlene (350/550/700)
* zombiePartyGirl (350/500/800)
* zombieNurse (300/500/700)
* zombieJoe (350/550/700)
* zombieSteve (350/550/700)
* zombieTomClark (350/550/800)
* zombieBusinessMan (350/550/800)
* zombieBurnt (350/550/700)
* zombieSpider (600/800/1200)

### ZOMBIES: NORMAL

* zombieBoe (450/750/1000)
* zombieJanitor (500/750/1100)
* zombieMoe (450/750/1200)
* zombieLab (400/600/800)
* zombieDarlene (400/550/800)
* zombieYo (450/600/850)
* zombieUtilityWorker (550/750/1250)

### ZOMBIES: STRONG

* zombieBiker (700/1000/1500)
* zombieLumberjack (600/850/1200)
* zombieFemaleFat (700/900/1200)
* zombieFatHawaiian (700/900/1300)
* zombieFatCop (700/900/1350)

### ZOMBIES: FIT

* zombieSkateboarder (450/700/850)
* zombieSoldier (800/1000/1600)
* zombieWightFeral (1000/1600)

###  ZOMBIES: SPECIAL

* zombieScreamer (800/1000/1500)
* zombieMutated (800/1000/1500)
* zombieDemolition (1000)
* zombieSteveCrawler (800/1000)
